table_caption: Brain locations where clusters of significant differences between groups were found for both standard and FW-DTI analyses.
table_foot: All results are shown for p < 0.01 (FWE corrected), except for the last column, indicated by *, where RD (HC) < RD (AD) is reported at p < 0.05 (FWE corrected). % columns indicate the percent volume of the cluster inside the corresponding brain area.For JHU white-matter tractography atlas: ATR anterior thalamic radiation, CST cortical spinal tract, CGC cingulum (cingulate gyrus part), CGH cingulum (hippocampal part), IFOF inferior fronto-occipital fasciculus, ILF inferior longitudinal fasciculus, UF uncinate fasciculus. For ICBM-DTI-81 white-matter atlas: CC corpus callosum, LIC limb of internal capsule, IC internal capsule, CR corona radiate, SS sagittal stratum, SFOF superior fronto-occipital fasciculus.
